chapters.title: Chapter 17:  A Bronze Bear
chapters.info: Lord Conail Northan, p. 372—High Seat of House Northan. He is tall and lean, has bony arms, an engaging grin, merry brown eyes, and an eagle's beak of a nose. He is not much older than sixteen. He thinks Arymilla is incompetant, and pledged the support of his House to Elayne.
